description: The pathway model depicts the initial B cell activation inside the lymph node and the following activation routes to differentiate to either plasmablast cells following the extrafollicular pathway or memory B cells through the follicular pathway. Detailed pathway description and its application for data visualization can be found in this preprint doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2022.12.19.521064
title: Extrafollicular and follicular B cell activation by SARS-CoV-2
